cast.name: 克日什托夫·基耶斯洛夫斯基 Krzysztof Kieślowski

trans_title: 基斯洛夫斯基：一位波兰影人
introduction: In "1966-1988: Kieślowski, cinéaste polonais", Luc Lagier follows the career of Polish director Krzysztof Kieślowski from 1964, when he entered the film school at Lodz, to 1991 and "La double vie de Véronique". The story is set all the while in the context of the political situation in Poland which, it goes without saying, heavily influenced Kieślowski's films. An interesting view for Kieślowski beginners and fans alike.
chinese_title: 基斯洛夫斯基：一位波兰影人
